text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/evidence-report-section defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
Evidence Evidence ResultsEvidence Results.
Intervention-group-alone-Evidence Evidence Results for the intervention exposure onlyEvidence Results for the intervention exposure only.
Intervention-vs-Control-Evidence Evidence Results for comparison of Intervention and ControlEvidence Results for comparison of Intervention and Control.
Control-group-alone-Evidence Evidence Results for the control exposure onlyEvidence Results for the control exposure only.
EvidenceVariable Evidence Variables usedEvidence Variables used.
EvidenceVariable-observed Evidence Variables actually observedEvidence Variables as observed in the research data.
EvidenceVariable-intended Evidence Variables intended for interpretationEvidence Variables intended for interpretation.
EvidenceVariable-population Evidence Variable in variable role PopulationEvidence Variable in variable role Population.
EvidenceVariable-exposure Evidence Variable in variable role ExposureEvidence Variable in variable role Exposure.
EvidenceVariable-outcome Evidence Variable in variable role Outcome (MeasuredVariable)Evidence Variable in variable role Outcome (MeasuredVariable).
Efficacy-outcomes Efficacy-outcomesOutcomes related to efficacy or potential benefits of interventions.
Harms-outcomes Harms outcomesOutcomes related to adverse effects or potential harms of interventions.
SampleSize Sample SizeSample Size.
References ReferencesReferences.
Assertion AssertionAssertion.
Reasons ReasonsReasons.
Certainty-of-Evidence Certainty of EvidenceCertainty of Evidence.
Evidence-Classifier Evidence Classifier sectionThis section is used for classifiers of the evidence.
Warnings WarningsWarnings.
Text-Summary Text SummaryDenotes a section specifying text summary for a report.
SummaryOfBodyOfEvidenceFindings Summary of Body of Evidence FindingsSummary of Body of Evidence Findings.
SummaryOfIndividualStudyFindings Summary of Individual Study FindingsSummary of Individual Study Findings.
Header HeaderDenotes the header to use for a Text Summary or above a Table.
Tables TablesTables.
Table Table
Row-Headers Row HeadersDenotes a section specifying row headers for a tabular report.
Column-Header Column HeaderDenotes the header to use for the column for a tabular report.
Column-Headers Column HeadersDenotes a section specifying column headers for a tabular report.
